members.joinCircumstances: Bartolomeo is the founder and captain of the Barto Club
Gambia serves as Bartolomeo's loyal staff officer

keyMoments.title: Bartolomeo Defends Gambia
keyMoments.description: When crew member Gambia is knocked down by Vice Admiral Maynard, Bartolomeo violently defeats the Vice Admiral in retaliation, demonstrating fierce loyalty to his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the strong bond between Bartolomeo and his crew members, showing he will fiercely protect them.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with Bartolomeo's distinctive hairstyle and fangs

members.joinCircumstances: Bellamy is the founder and captain of the Bellamy Pirates

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Reunites with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bellamy encounters Luffy at the Corrida Colosseum, showing respect and acknowledging his past mistakes regarding dreams and Sky Island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bellamy's character growth and the evolution of his relationship with Luffy.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a cross behind it and smiling expression

members.joinCircumstances: Guernika is a CP0 agent operating in Dressrosa
Joseph is a CP0 agent operating in Dressrosa
Gismonda is a CP0 agent operating in Dressrosa

keyMoments.title: CP0 Debuts in Dressrosa
keyMoments.description: CP0 agents make their first appearance in the series, establishing their presence in Dressrosa as the World Government's elite intelligence agency.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of CP0, marking a major escalation in World Government involvement in the story.

jollyRoger.description: CP0 uses the World Government's emblem, not a traditional jolly roger
